alert.note: Alert for Barber; Comanche (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 2:18AM CDT until July 21 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BARBER AND COMANCHE COUNTIES... At 218 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Sun City to near Aetna to 16 miles east of Buttermilk to 6 miles northwest of Freedom, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Coldwater, Lake City, Wilmore, Aetna, Lake Coldwater and Buttermilk. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
